entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow over southern sections before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
